description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Role:
              
              As a Senior Business Analyst, your primary objective is understanding clients’ needs by capturing the domain expertise that the client has and translating into succinct documents in order to serve as the inputs for software development team.
              
              Responsibilities:
              
              •	Study existing information processing systems to evaluate effectiveness and promote enhancements in systems to improve production or workflow as required.
              
              •	Analyze and document business requirements in details by using UML Diagrams, Use Cases, Functional Specifications and communicate them clearly to Stakeholders and Software Development Team.
              
              •	Maintain all Requirement Artifacts during the Software Development Lifecycle.
              
              •	Verify all requested requirements are included in the product, and the product does not implement the features not required;
              
              •	Be a communication bridge between Client and Software Development Team, between internal Development Team.
              
              •	Provide technical guidance and monitor Associate Business Analyst and Business Analyst.
              
              •	Take a Business Analyst Lead role in Projects and be a key member in a Business Analyst team.
              
              •	Participate in other activities to improve the service of the product and other process alignment (e.g. internal audit, R&D, etc.….)
              
              •	Directly report to PM and/or client.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              To be successful candidate for this role, you have:
              
              •	Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or Business related field
              
              •	3-5 years’ experience in Business Analyst role in a client facing role
              
              •	Good knowledge of software development process, especially software requirement analysis.
              
              •	Ability to compose and manage business requirement artifacts accurately for each phase of the Software Development Lifecycle.
              
              •	Strong attitude to do research and to apply emerging technologies.
              
              •	Exceptional communication skills with demonstrated ability to communicate effectively with both a technical audience and business users.
              
              •	Strong leadership qualities with good presentation, time management and client relation skills.
              
              •	Excellent command of English communication (oral and written).
              
              •	Good interpersonal and collaboration skills, strong team working ability.
              
              •	Ability to travel to client’s site when necessary.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
